Key Match Events: Jimmy Butler exited the game between the Miami Heat and Denver Nuggets on November 8, 2024, due to an ankle injury.
The Denver Nuggets beat the Miami Heat 135-122.
Tyler Herro scored 24 points, while Bam Adebayo and Duncan Robinson each scored 20 points for the Miami Heat.
Post-Match Reflections: The Miami Heat are struggling with a 3-5 record and their chances of a revival on this road trip seem bleak with Jimmy Butler's injury.
The Heat have been plagued by injuries during the Jimmy Butler era, affecting their regular-season success.
